listing.notes: Brand new still in shrink-plastic. Imported from Braincog. I have three of theese. Im selling them for 300 SEK each ($46.26). You can see a review of the game on boardgames with scott http://www.boardgameswithscott.com/?p=77 The game is located in Västerås or Stockholm. If you dont want to pay for shipping you can come to either city and pick it up. Contact me on: contact@kristiankarlberg.se or send a message on BGG.

Braincog Inc (COG 0001) Portrayal is a funny, fast-paced, family / party game that tests each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s ability to describe, draw, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; evaluate wacky images. In each hilarious round of Portrayal, one player (the Portrayer) describes a unique and utterly bizarre image while the other players (the Artists) attempt to draw the image based solely on the Portrayer’s description. Once time is up, Artists trade drawings and the ten hidden criteria for the image are uncovered. It’s up to each Artist to decide whether the drawing he or she is judging meets the criteria and receives points. Portrayal is great for large groups and can be used as a tool in classrooms and corporate team building activities.

Asmodee (ASMDUP01US) Can you draw what you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t see? Draw the pictures as you hear them described. Can you match the original art without ever being able to see it? You don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need to be a talented artist, you just have to be ready to laugh. In Duplik, a player acting as the Art Director will describe the drawing on the card and everyone else will try to draw it. Players will just need to get the details right, and the rest will take care of itself. Once everyone has a chance to draw, check the original image and see how well you did! Duplikis a light-hearted game perfect for just about anyone. Sharpen your pencils and get ready to enjoy yourself, whether you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re at a party or just family game night.
